dialogStrings:
“Today's the big day when we
welcome President Rufus!
Hurry up and change!”

“There's a uniform in the locker.
Hurry and change!”

{Cloud}
“There's Shinra soldiers all around.
Better not try anything dumb…”

{Cloud}
“A Shinra uniform…”{PAUSE}“I was so proud when I first
put it on.”

{Cloud}
“I wonder when it was…”{PAUSE}“…I couldn't stand wearing
this thing anymore.”

“…The look on your face says you forgot.
All right, I'll show you again!”

“Good!
Make sure you do well
at the real parade!”

“All right, show time!
Don't disgrace yourselves!”

“Keep in step with the soldier next to you
and march smoothly!”

“Once you're all in step,
shoulder your gun!”
“We'll practice some more!”{PAUSE}“Remember to march smoothly!”

“This is the military, soldier!!
Your orders for today are to send off
President Rufus at the dock!”

“I'll keep drilling you
until it's time!”

“All right!!
Line up in order and
show me your final pose!”

“So, you got it?”
{CHOICE}Not yet!
{CHOICE}I've got it!

“All right! Don't mess up
during the real thing!”

“All right, rookie!!
I'll let you decide!”{PAUSE}“Show me your best move!”

“All right!!
We'll go with that as
as our special!!”

“Well then! Meet at the dock!!
Don't be late!!”{PAUSE}“Attention!
Dismissed!!”

“Someday I'll get to use my
special pose in a real battle!”

“Same here!!
I'll keep practicing until then!”

akao.name: gun
akao.description: Shinra Army Wages A Full-Scale Attack
